attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In view of the Irish NO vote to the EU Treaty, we petition the Prime Minister to meet the EU rules, which state that all 27 member States must agree to the Treaty, and declare the EU Treaty dead.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
